Shareholder Name: Khaled Saad Al Aoud Al Fadhly

Description: The National Company for Glass Industries (known as: Zoujaj) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since December 1993. Zoujaj operates within the Materials sector focusing on Metal and Glass Containers. It has Companies ies operating across Saudi Arabia and UAE, working on Metal and Glass Containers and Electrical Components and Equipment. Zoujaj is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in January 1990.
Company Name: The National Company for Glass Industries (2150)
